      java.lang.String getExtnPathIdentifier(SCUIContext uiContext)
      This method should return the path identifier under which the extensions will be available uiContext String
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getExtnPathIdentifierHierarchy(java.lang.String extnPathIdentifier, SCUIContext uiContext)
      This method should return a HashMap of the PathIdentifiers hierarchy, where (Key, Value) should be (PathIdetifier, ParentToPathIdentifier) Takes a parameter uiContext to figure out what the PathIdentifer is and make sure it is present the map before return extnPathIdentifier, uiContext HashMap[String, String]
      boolean isPathBasedExtnEnabled()
      This method returns the boolean to signify whether extensibility based on path identifiers is enabled.
